column5: Rental is 2nd floor  - no smoking - Sleeps 4 comfortably 6 maybe  - Upstairs is 1,000 ft2 - - 2 bedrooms, (1st has Queen, 2nd can have two double beds) -- Large den with Queen bed & flat screen TV  -- Dog & I live downstairs - Common areas: Kitchen/Den, Living/Dining Room, Washer/Dryer  - Up to date, professionally decorated - Surrounded by restaurants & shopping meccas - One block from Children's & Dog Park - Love Field, White Rock Lake, DFW Airport, Arts District all within 1/2 hour
column8: 1,000' 2nd floor 3 beds 2 bedrooms, Den, Full Bath
